title: New Ranked team being created
body: I already currently have 1 ranked team although we do not play as often as i would like, i also have a few other players who are seeking a ranked team so i have decided that i am going to create a 2nd ranked team. Currently nothing is set so we are searching for anyone and everyone of all ranks and roles. Wtih only one requirement that you be fairly active so we can play and win win win. If you have any questions or are interested feel free to message me on here and i can add you or you can add me directly on 'hashshashin'.

replies.body: I main support (Nami mostly) but can also jungle, I hate solo queue cause of what it is but would like to try for season rewards if you're interested. I'm available pretty much whenever but usually play norms or other games with friends after 9:30.

Hey man 

Im keen to join also. I main adc and top but i can play any role {{champion:18}}
I'm in if possible, I'm a support main, can mid and jungle. add me in game; KillerLlama
I would be keen to join. Can play most roles but top/adc is my best. add me in game: i small wang
